wikipedia_page.main: Francis  Gallagher (born 8 July 1962) is a Scottish actor who has played many roles since 1989 on stage, film, and television.  Primarily active on the theatre stage for the first twenty years of his career, he is most recently and popularly known for portraying the gangster, Leonard "Lenny" Murdoch, in BBC Scotland's award winning drama River City.
